author: Michel Condoroussis
comment: Now that Google Finance will no longer allow portfolio tracking I was looking for an alternative. This app gives some cool views and nice tracking including some great graphs. I would love to see details on all my portfolios together like it does within each portfolio since I can't mix stocks of different currencies within one portfolio so a full view is not really available. Plus I'd love to set the home page to see what I want right away. Still a great tracker for your stocks, just shy of what I use to have.

author: Mike Bawlz
comment: Works well, and displays an all important chart of my entire portfolio, which it seems no other app does. I would purchase if it wasn't subscription based - a subscription isn't warranted for this kind of service. Now I'm back on the hunt for a similar app which offers the same features through an outright purchase rather than subscription based licence.

author: Peter Hu
comment: Recently, the quote updates have been terrible on this app. I try to refresh at 11am and it still shows me the prices from yesterday. I use Ticker for all my watchlists and portfolios, but will be moving on to better, more reliable apps soon .

author: Adam Brown
comment: Great app! A lot of info carefully organized with helpful widgets. Love the candlestick charts built in.  Updated: quotes aren't real time. It's useless if the quotes aren't updating until the end of the day.

author: Saif Patel
comment: Was a great app so paid for monthly subscription. Now it's stopped refreshing or loading up the quotes, just frozen on the same share prices for whole day! Going to cancel my subscription! Shame

author: Ivan Altukhov
comment: It was great, but now it doesn't refresh stocks from MOEX (at random - some is ok, graphs are ok, but prices are out of date so P/L is wrong). Disappointed, 'cause it's really useful app. But no longer for me.

author: Keith Rodgers
comment: Has a lot of issues showing all stocks everyday. Have 20% if my stock missing on most days and often different stock missing.

author: Chee Yang Teo
comment: Good: Excellent software and user friendly.  Bad: Always getting Could not get latest price error with some stocks and data stability needs to be greatly enhanced. Price for the software is too expensive

author: Zachary McGovern
comment: Ok looking app but doesn't do anything yahoo finance can't do and yahoo finance doesn't require a subscription. Also can't enter mutual funds which makes the app unusable as a primary system of recors for your investments.  The additional features aren't worth mainting this app if you also have to use another for mutual funds

author: Peter Mooney
comment: It's ok when working, but at least one of my positions randomly shows ERROR and doesn't load the data, so it looks like my money is missing and I don't know what the price is. Meh.

author: Steven Messer
comment: It's a good app if you have fewer than the max number of trades you need before you have to pay for the subscription. Ran into an issue today though, while it seems to track stock splits fine, it doesn't seem to track reverse splits. I had to go in and manually multiply the price and divide the shares from past trades to keep the P/L chart accurate.

author: Zent Zed
comment: User friendly and good app to keep track on your portfolio. Unfortunately stock price is not real time so would think twice before deciding to subscribe

author: Greg Tandecki
comment: Can't find the most common funds latest price. Worthless app.

I use this app as my primary, mobile monitoring platform for my active trading endeavors....used throughout the day, countless times, I monitor my selected stocks across three different categories....the graphs are great....I've made many trades (and thousands of dollars in profits...) because of what I'm able to see with this app.

Very bad lately. Constantly network errors and trouble loading data, making the app unusable. Big security hole, by opening the app just twice after each other you can circumvent the passcode. Never received replies to my 3 bug reports. Quotes are not loaded anymore. Cancelled my subscription after 2 years.

author: Bruce Burley
comment: Looked great but has glitches, added a portfolio and then two days later the portfolio was gone. Not keen on having to add back in every few days.

author: Steve Zerkie
comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Has a great widget that I keep on one of my home screens so I can see quickly how the markets are doing. Open the app and I get all kinds of details.

author: Luke Dubbeld
comment: Having some serious issues getting quotes lately which is frustrating. Needs to be fixed ASAP. If not will be moving on to something else

author: Darius Alisantoso
comment: Lost all data in Watch List and Portfolio!!! To make it worst, unable to access Portfolio. It keeps loading but stuck.

reply.author: Innopage
reply.content: We apologize for this error, please contact our support at info@innopage.com with your account info.  We will help you get back your data.

author: Tom Coward
comment: I enjoyed the free version, so upgraded to the paid version, but recently it has stopped updating (similar to a lot of comments on here). Hoping this can be resolved, but if not I'll stop using this app and find an alternative

author: Hardik Jani
comment: Please do not use this app ...portfolios do not load.at all..no help is provided after multiple emails & calls ... Absolutely waste of time & energy...

author: John Knapp
comment: Not bad for tracking stock performance, or for tracking lists, etc. But.......  One issue I come across somewhat frequently is that some of the securities I own aren't updated on a daily basis. It could be that they're not high volume stocks. But that shouldn't be an excuse.  Other then that issue, it's not a bad app.

author: Kash Au
comment: Have subscribed to the app but am now unable to view any updated prices for my portfolio. Have sent an email but have not received any reply

author: Steve Bird
comment: After a recent update it's thrown away all my settings and watch lists. All my trades I recorded have gone wasting all my time and history destroyed. Not impressed !!

author: Derek Hewitt
comment: Was working great until recently. The widget is broken
Iv'e only used the app since yesterday, and I noticed the stock prices on my portfolio are not real time quotes. Seems to be a lag time

author: Kimbal Szeto
comment: Subscriber for months, recently last 6 months there have been a bunch of issues unresolved. Will be moving on once I find another app.

author: Noah Thederahn
comment: Can't get prices for some of my socks (MDYG) to add trades. Subscription model doesn't make sense for this type of product especially since her can't track all my assets. Looking for something better.

author: Mike Sef
comment: This app is terrible in giving you quote updates. It takes hours to get the information

author: Yannick Bounouar
comment: Password recovery doesn't work... I lost all my portfolisos after changing phone..

author: Johan Rodskog
comment: I actually like the app and especially the layout, but too many of my share and ETF investments shows up with n/a for price, completely defeating the purpose of the app

author: Tim Lamarre
comment: This damn program keeps losing my portfolios for no reason.

author: João Queiroga
comment: O aplicativo parece excelente para acompanhar uma carteira de ações contudo falha no básico: as cotações não atualizam, dão erro ou demora muito para atualizar. Nem o índice Bovespa dá para acompanhar. Espero que melhore...

author: Dale Cooper
comment: I'm a paid subscriber. This app no longer updates prices until very late in the day if ever. I will be canceling my subscription!
Recently receiving error on some stock prices when updating

author: Shawn Nelson
comment: Price updates are too laggy to make using it worthwhile but the app works well.
Easy to use. Good layout once I got used to it. No bugs so far.

author: Yves Rioux
comment: Work perfectly. I'm 100% happy but it cost too much. 2$ per month. I can be willing to pay 1$ per month for this app.

author: Tor Atle Lunde
comment: Stock quote updates not reliable.

author: Michael Groff
comment: Works well, I like the portfolio option can see progress of my decisions in real time.
